nodes.text: The Nalle triplets, comprising Mya Nalle, Yma Nalle and Lela Nalle Mayn, were a trio of Human females offered by Mayor Acros-Krik as guides to targets he wanted monitored. The Nalle triplets reported to the mayor any useful information their guests foolishly divulged.
They were in the Outlander Club on Coruscant before the outbreak of the Clone Wars in 22 BBY.
Mya Nalle, Yma Nalle and Lela Mayn, seen in Attack of the Clones, were all portrayed by an uncredited Amy Allen. All of the triplets' names are anagrams of her name.

The shot in which Mya and Yma Nalle appear was completed after principal photography using a limited number of actors and costumes, with some being duplicated to better populate the shot. The idea of the Nalle triplets was used to explain why two such similar-looking women appeared in one shot, with Lela Mayn later being confirmed as the third Nalle sister.
